p: Polyherbal extracts showed lot of potential than individual extracts. The selected three medicinal plants ( Vetiveria zizanioides, Trichosanthes cucumerina and Mollugo cerviana) showed synergistic activity. The polyherbal extract showed enhanced antibacterial activity due to synergistic effect. Also, polyherbal extract showed promising antioxidant and anticancer activities against HeLa and MEF cell lines. Potential anticancer activity of polyherbal extract was mainly due to the combined activity of V. zizanioides, T. cucumerina and M. cerviana. Also, further investigation is required to evaluate their effect to develop as chemotherapeutic agent.
